name: Skyscaker
description:
Skyscaker is a game that will push your architectural skills to the limit. With the different cakes you will have to create a tower of cakes as big as possible, but be careful, you will have to create a good base so that your tower doesn't fall down.

Get the highest score to create a real Skyscaker!

Controls

Cakes will appear and you will have to click and drag them to form a tower, don't let them fall down because they will take lives from you. If you need a break you can pause the game using SPACE.

Good luck!!
